a.title: Application for Meals Benefit Assistance( English)

div.a: Application for Meals Benefit Assistance( English)

nav.div: Moultonborough School District » Distance Learning » SCHOOL MEALS

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;

span.style: color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-size: 14pt; font-family: "footlight mt light", serif;

p.span: If you have experienced a layoff, loss of employment or even simply a reduction in hours due to the COVID-19 crisis, you may now qualify for Meal Benefit Assistance from USDA.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;
p.span:
This benefit is not automatically provided if you file for unemployment benefits – it is an additional application that is easy to complete and needs to be submitted directly to the school district.
Please find the application in the menu for this page.
If you have any questions or need assistance with the forms, contact abergquist@sau45.org.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 18px;
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 18px;

span.span: Starting Monday March 23, 2020 we will be serving bagged meals for a three and two day time period. Meals will be available for pick up Mondays and Thursdays between the hours of 8 AM-11 AM at the Academy back kitchen doors. You will need to continue to sign up ahead of time to give us an idea how many to make. Send an email to

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: with child’s name and if we need to be aware of any allergies. These meals are free to

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: school children. All bags will contain breakfast and lunch for the appropriate amount of days. Please feel free to ask any questions thru this email also and we will do our best to get you answers.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 18px;

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.em: Distance Learning School Breakfast and Lunch Program

p.span: The Moultonborough School District will be offering FREE pre-ordered breakfast/lunch bags to ALL students. Pre-order daily by 7pm for pickup the next day.

span.br: The bags will be available for curb-side pickup during the hours of 8:00am – 11:00am.
Curb-side pickup will be on the backside of the Moultonborough Academy at 25 Blake Road

strong.span: Look for sign on cafeteria door

span.br: Breakfast: a juice, a fruit item and a breakfast item.

p.span: Lunch: milk, veggie item, fruit item and a sandwich.
Please identify the students name(s) and any allergies.

img.title: map of MA
img.br: If your family has additional food needs, please contact our district social worker Christine Witchley, our school counselors, or school nurses.
